content: **info** i have changed my free patterns to online-viewing recently because they were sadly pirated and offered on dubious websites - so there is no possibility to download it as usual i if you need to have the pattern in printed form you might find a workaround by either copy-paste the text into a word or text edit file or save each page in the form of screenshots off the full size view there might be a lot of other workarounds using another 3rd party application which i am unaware of i am sorry that i had to withdraw the pdf file as a downloadable pattern this was the only solution i could think off which would still offer the patterns for free **another variation has been added to the existing pattern** as of january 2014 it has a tubular cast on and much more pronounced decreases - a kind of a pointy/hipster version of the original cocoon hat two sizes available for both versions so i had this hat i bought years ago although it was made out of cheap acrylic yarn it always has been my favorite even after i started knitting and had made so many hats myself and out of much nobler material i always fell back to this store- bought ratty old hat because i just loved it s fit and style but after all this time and wear it finally gave up this winter and i just had to make one exactly like it to replace my all time favorite hat with the help of the gorgeous cocoon yarn from rowan i made the impossible possible i made an even better hat than my old one was since now i don t only love it s fit and style but also the softness and warmth of a fine merino & mohair blend **yarn** cocoon by rowan or any other bulky weight yarn at 115m or 126 yards/100gr *round crown * natural colourway 806 frost 1 skein 34 5 39 gr or approximately 40 45 meters / 44 50 yards purple colourway 811 lavender ice 1 skein 32 36 5 gr or approximately 37 5 42 meters / 41 46 yards light brown colourway 808 tundra 1 skein 16 18 gr or approximately 19 21 meters / 21 23 yards dark brown colourway 809 crag 1 skein 7 8 5 gr or approximately 8 10 meters / 9 11 yards blue colourway 827 misty blue 1 skein 3 3 5 gr or approximately 3 6 4 meters / 4 4 5 yards *pointy crown * dark brown colourway 809 crag 1 2 skeins 93 105 gr or approximately 107 122 meters / 118 125 yards **needles** 5 5mm/us9 and 5mm/us8 circular needles at least 40 cm/16 long or dpn s *and for tubular co only in pointy crown * 3 5mm/us4 **gauge ** 16sts and 32 row in 10cm/4 in broken rib st on 5 5mm / us 9 needles *after* blocking **skill level **
